11.content:
It was a seemingly peaceful day for Ash and his friends as they made their way through a forest to their next destination. Currently, the group was stopping for lunch in the campsite they had set up.

Ash was currently traveling with his friends Misty and Brock. Misty had taken some time off from the Cerulean Gym to join him for a bit of traveling, while Brock was currently preparing lunch. He had to admit, he liked traveling with them again.

"Sure is fun traveling with Misty and Brock again, right Pikachu?" he asked his partner, who currently sat on his shoulder.

"Pika!" the electric-type replied

As the trainer walked through the campsite, he suddenly tripped, and fell to the ground. "Woah!" he let out in surprised. He then looked at what he had tripped over, and saw that it was a strange looking rock sticking out of the ground. He the dug it out and examined it. "Wonder what this is...?" he wondered out loud. He then walked over to the others. "Hey guys!" he called out and they all gathered around him.

"What is it, Ash?" Misty asked.

"I just found a weird stone burried in the ground." he said as he held it out for them to see.

"Wow, what kind of stone is that?" Misty wondered.

"Looks almost like an evolution stone, but not one that I'm familiar with." Brock said.

As they looked over the stone, it suddenly began to glow, and a bright, blinding light engulfed the group.

12.content:
It was a seemingly peaceful day for Ash and his friends as they made their way through a forest to their next destination. Currently, the group was stopping for lunch in the campsite they had set up.

Ash was currently traveling with his friends May and Brock. May had come along to join him for a bit of traveling as she practiced for some upcoming contests, while Brock was currently preparing lunch. He had to admit, he liked traveling with them again.

"Sure is fun traveling with May and Brock again, right Pikachu?" he asked his partner, who currently sat on his shoulder.

"Pika!" the electric-type replied

As the trainer walked through the campsite, he suddenly tripped, and fell to the ground. "Woah!" he let out in surprised. He then looked at what he had tripped over, and saw that it was a strange looking rock sticking out of the ground. He the dug it out and examined it. "Wonder what this is...?" he wondered out loud. He then walked over to the others. "Hey guys!" he called out and they all gathered around him.

"What is it, Ash?" May asked.

"I just found a weird stone burried in the ground." he said as he held it out for them to see.

"Wow, what kind of stone is that?" May wondered.

"Looks almost like an evolution stone, but not one that I'm familiar with." Brock said.

As they looked over the stone, it suddenly began to glow, and a bright, blinding light engulfed the group.

1223.content:
The blinding light dies down and they all shake their heads.

"Well, that was weird..." Ash says, but it comes out odd. Almost deeper than usual. That's when Ash notices that he is holding the stone, but he's not him. He looks down and finds out that he's now Brock.

Pikachu's eyes widen as a bunch of quick "pikapikapika"s escape his mouth. Pikachu then covers his own mouth and falls off of "Ash's" shoulder.

"What is happening?" "Ash" asks, obviously confused.

"I have a feeling I know." May said, much more properly than she usually talks. "My trainer Ash touched a stone that may have some type of connection to a legendary. As a result, we all swapped bodies."

"Pi-pika-kachu!" "Pikachu" prompting PikaMay to shake their head. "I'm sorry May, but there's no guarantee it'll work."

"We'll never know if we don't try!" AshBrock says, grabbing the stone again. This results in...
1223.title: They instantly swap bodies

12231.content:
The stone emits another blinding light that they are all enveloped in. It fades away after a moment, leaving them all slightly dazed.

"Did it work?" Ash asks as he gains his bearings. His voice was higher and feminine this time, revealing that he still was not in his own body. Ash examines his new hands and looks down at himself, confirming that he's now in May's body, as two large bulges on his chest obscure his vision slightly. He awkwardly pokes one of them with a finger, unsure how to feel about this change.

Across from him, his own body begins to move, and Pikachu, on the ground next to his body tries to speak, saying only "Pika-Pikachu!" Pikachu frowns and looks at Brock.

"Ew!" Ash's body says, looking at its hands and then examining the rest of itself. "I'm Ash!"

"May?" Ash asks, already knowing who was in his body.

May nods, then groans aloud. "This feels weird. How do we switch back to normal?"

Brock's body rubs its temple in though. "I think we should try to use the stone again and hope we get put back into our own bodies this time." Brock, in Pikachu's body, nods. "Pika!"

"Let's do this quickly," May says, "I want to get back to my body as soon as possible."

Pikachu nods in agreement, and Ash grabs the stone again.

What happens to them?

14.content:
It was a seemingly peaceful day for Ash and his friends as they made their way through a forest to their next destination. Currently, the group was stopping for lunch in the campsite they had set up.

Ash was currently traveling with his friends Iris and Cilan. Iris had decided to tag along to join him for a bit of traveling as she did some training, while Cilan was currently preparing lunch. He had to admit, he liked traveling with them again.

"Sure is fun traveling with Iris and Cilan again, right Pikachu?" he asked his partner, who currently sat on his shoulder.

"Pika!" the electric-type replied

As the trainer walked through the campsite, he suddenly tripped, and fell to the ground. "Woah!" he let out in surprised. He then looked at what he had tripped over, and saw that it was a strange looking rock sticking out of the ground. He the dug it out and examined it. "Wonder what this is...?" he wondered out loud. He then walked over to the others. "Hey guys!" he called out and they all gathered around him.

"What is it, Ash?" Iris asked.

"I just found a weird stone burried in the ground." he said as he held it out for them to see.

"Wow, what kind of stone is that?" Iris wondered.

"Looks almost like an evolution stone, but not one that I'm familiar with." Cilan said.

As they looked over the stone, it suddenly began to glow, and a bright, blinding light engulfed the group.

15533121.content:
As the flash of light died down, they all looked around in confusion. "What was that?" Ash wondered

"I'm not sure." Misty said.

"Well whatever it was, it was really weird." Dawn said.

As they talked, Ash bcame aware of a strange feeling just above his butt, but ignored it.

"So anway, after lunch is done, why don't we pack up and get on our way to the next town." May suggested.

"Sounds good to me." Iris agreed.

"I don't mind." Cilan said.

"Then I guess we all agree." Brock said.

For Ash, the strange feeling persisted, and he scratched it briefly.

"Pi pika!" Pikachu said with a worried tone from Ash's shoulder, and was pointing behind him.

"Huh?" Ash questioned as he looked at what his friend was pointing at, and let out a gasp as he saw there was a lump in his pants. "What is that?" he said worriedly.

"Whats wrong, Ash?" Misty asked.

"I feel something weird, and now something is poking out in my pants!"

After a few moments, there was a tearing sound, and poking out from a tear in his pants was what was unmistakably a small Pikachu tail. "Gah! Why do I have a Pikachu tail!?" he let out in shock.

"How should we know?" Dawn replied worriedly.

"Uh, is it just me, or does it look like its getting bigger?" May asked. And sure enough, she was right. It was happening slowly, but it was growing. And it was going to grow until it became the appropriate size for his body.

"Hey, look!" Iris said, pointing at Ash's face.

"Hes got red circles on his cheeks, just like Pikachu's!" Brock said.

"Huh?" Ash let out. He looked around to his friends, wishing that one of them could do something to help him. As he did, he took note of somethings about them. For Misty, he saw a circular object in the back of her pants. For both May and Dawn, their lips looked to be slightly harder and getting a yellowish tint. Iris's fangs looked to be getting bigger. Brock's skin was slightly rougher. And finally, Cilan's hair looked kinda leafy. "Uh, guys, I don't think I'm the only person that this is happening to..." he warned them, alerting them to their own changes, and they began to freak out.

In a few minutes, Ash's Pikachu tail had reached full size, and he had the red circles on his cheeks. Misty now also had a tail, only her's was a Marill's. Dawn and MAy now had beak-like lips. Iris's new fangs had gotten longer and were pointing sideways. Brock's skin now seemed more rock-like, though not yet that hard. And Cilan's hair was sticking up and now had a bush on his head.
15533121.title: Yes

They are the only ones there
15533222221.content:
When the flash of light of the stone died down, the group instantly noticed that there were two things different. The first was that they were no longer outdoors, and now appreared to be inside of a Pokemon center. The second thing was that they're clothes had changed, and they were all now dressed in the exact same thing: the uniform that Nurse Joy wore.

"What the!? What just happened, and why are we dressed like this!?" Ash let out in shock, already freaking out.

"I don't know!" Misty replied with surprise.

"P-pika!" Pikachu said, still on Ash's shoulder. He was trying to calm his trainer down. Pikachu even had a small Nurse's cap on his head like the ones that Chanseys and Audinos would wear.

"This sure is weird." Cilan said as he looked down at the dress he currently wore.

"Tell me about it." Brock said. "I'm working to become a Pokemon Doctor, not a Nurse."

"Uh, what should we do now?" May asked.

"Well, maybe we should look around for Nurse Joy." Iris suggested. "Maybe if we're really lucky, she can help us find out how we got here."

"Maybe we can find something else to wear, too." Ash said, looking down at his own dress.

"Or at least find out where we are and how to get back to our campsite."
15533222221.title: Pokemon Nurses

choices: People enter, and act as if Ash and co. are Pokemon Nurses
155332222212.content:
After a bit of searching, they had looked all throughout the entire Pokemon Center, but couldn't find Nurse Joy anywere. The seven of them then gathered in the main lobby of the Center.

"It looks like we're the only ones here." Dawn said.

"And the only clothes here are more uniforms like these ones." Ash complained.

"And thats not all." Misty said. "I checked, and we're nowhere near the campsite. I don't know how, but we're in a completely different region!"

"What? But that should be impossible!" May said.

"It should, but here we all are." Cilan said. "Somehow transported to a Pokemon Center in a different region and dressed like Pokemon Nurses."

"To think that stone Ash found could be capable of that." Brock said.

"So now what should we do?" Iris asked.

"I don't know." Ash said.
155332222212.title: They are the only ones there

choices: They find themselve compelled to act as Pokemon Nurses
They go along with it as they try to find out whats going on
1553322222121.content:
Before they could discuss anything else about the situation, the front doors to the Pokemon Center opened, and in entered several people.

"Nurse Ash, could you please heal my Pokemon?" one of them, a boy that carrying a few Pokeballs, asked as he came up to the counter.

"Nurse Misty, can you please take a look at my Pokemon?" a girl holding two Pokeballs asked Misty.

None of the people who entered seemed to find anything strange about the seven of them being there, the lack of a Nurse Joy, or that boys like Ash, Brock, and Cilan were wearing the dress and such of Nurses. They seemed to think that they were all Nurses just like any Nurse Joy would be, and they were all even addressed as 'Nurse' before their names.
1553322222121.title: People enter, and act as if Ash and co. are Pok...

choices: They begin to act normal again
They continue to think and act this way
15533222221211.content:
As the people in the Pokemon Center , Ash and his friends suddenly felt different about their situation. It was as if a switch was flipped in their brains. While moments ago their thoughts were on their current situation, they were now completely focusing on helping the people and Pokemon coming into the center, forgetting that there was anything wrong with the situation.

Ash's posture changed as he faced the boy asking him for his help, and giving the boy a warm smile. "Of course I can help your Pokemon." he said, speaking with a sweet, caring, and almost feminine tone.

"Thank you, Nurse Ash!" the boy replied.

"Oh, you don't need to thank me. I'm only doing my job." he said, taking the boy's pokeballs and placing them on a tray to bring into the room where the machines for healing pokemon were. As he did, he seemed to be walking with a bit of a feminine gait.

Currently in Ash's mind, all thoughts of the strangeness of the current situation had vanished, at least for now. They were replaced by helping the people who came the Pokemon Center, and thoughts of how much he enjoyed being a Pokemon Nurse. In his mind currently, it was his dream to be a great one, just like the many Nurse Joy in the world, and he idolized and wanted to be like them. This was also the case for the others. As he went about setting the boy's Pokemon into the machine, he hummed cheerfully to himself.

Later, when everyone is gone...

info.brief_description: Ash and his friends find a strange stone that causes them to undergo strange changes
info.description:
The characters of the Pokemon series undergo changes. Physical, mental, any kind really. Just keep things consistent. Also, the changes don't always need to affect everybody.

They can also swap lives or turn into characters from other anime series or video games.

As for changes, don't always try to make everything lead to the same conclusion. Be creative and with similar stuff, don't always make it go the same direction as other paths.

Also, unless teleported away from them like into another world, try not to ignore the pokemon like Pikachu.

EDIT: Well, they didn't exist when I started this, but feel free to add Serena, Clemont, and Bonnie to groups if you feel like it.

No sex
No killing off characters
No ending the story
Please try to have good grammar and such

And of course, have fun!
